+ Wikid Pad

WikidPad is a [wiki]-like notebook for storing your thoughts, ideas,
todo lists, contacts, articles or anything else you can think of that's
important to You.  WikidPad is different from other notepad or outliner 
applications - e.g. see how easy you can cross-link your information.

Just type a CamelCase WikiWord in order to create a WikiLink in a wiki.
